title: Discovery
description: We dive deep into understanding your business, goals, target audience, and competitive landscape. This phase includes stakeholder interviews, market research, and requirements gathering.

title: Strategy
description: We develop a comprehensive digital strategy that outlines user journeys, feature prioritization, technical architecture, and success metrics aligned with your business objectives.

title: Design
description: Our design team creates wireframes and high-fidelity mockups that balance aesthetics with functionality. We iterate based on your feedback and conduct usability testing.

title: Development
description: Our developers build the website or application using modern technologies and best practices. Regular check-ins ensure the final product exceeds expectations.

title: QA & Testing
description: Comprehensive testing across all browsers, devices, and user scenarios. We identify and fix bugs, optimize performance, and validate accessibility compliance.

title: Launch
description: We deploy your project to production, set up monitoring, configure analytics, and ensure everything is running smoothly. Comprehensive documentation is provided.

title: Support & Optimization
description: Post-launch support includes bug fixes, performance monitoring, and data-driven optimizations. We continue to improve based on real user behavior and feedback.
